about_the_game:
This game is a small visual novel

Features:
- part one of twenty-seven
- 20-30 minutes long.
- English and Japanese text
- some choices lead to new dialogue
- The game can be saved at any time
- An in-game log keeps track of the story

In a vast and mysterious realm, three unlikely allies - Joe, Ruffian, and Hamlet - embark on a dangerous quest that will test their courage and fortitude to the fullest. As they traverse ancient forests, treacherous rivers, and valleys of shadow, they encounter formidable challenges and discover long-forgotten mysteries that hold the fate of the world. This is the first of 27 books.
